posts.post_content: the nice thing is that it doesnt actually have to hit the player, it just needs to attack, and at 3/7 he is pretty safe from creatures. Hopefully by the time you have 5 mana, their hand is already destroyed so they wont be able to counter him right away either.

Posted By: Demonic_Angel13 (5/13/2009 6:05:24 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: The card is really great buy the huge issue is it is subject to spells like Terminate etc...It needs shroud but I wonder If that would be to overboard. Either way you can use Robe of Mirrors for the cost of one to make it super powerful or protective bubble. But my suggestion to use Nemesis is in a milling deck/hand combo deck black and blue. While you tear their hand away early in the game with Duress x4 or Mind Wrench you can also use Brainbite. Use dark ritual early in the game to squeeze more Duresses or other hand milling you think is better. Then on your fourth or third turn bust out a dark ritual and mill their hand with a Duress and use the extra to bring out Nemesis. Even if they have counters use Raise Dead x4 some cards that bring back creatures or other spells are too expensive so I suggest low cost spells like Raise Dead or use Countersquall and Counterspell. On an added note do what I did and add x4 Nemesis x4 Duress x4 Raise Dead x1 Damnation x4 Counterspell x4 Coun... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
The card is really great buy the huge issue is it is subject to spells like Terminate etc...It needs shroud but I wonder If that would be to overboard. Either way you can use Robe of Mirrors for the cost of one to make it super powerful or protective bubble. But my suggestion to use Nemesis is in a milling deck/hand combo deck black and blue. While you tear their hand away early in the game with Duress x4 or Mind Wrench you can also use Brainbite. Use dark ritual early in the game to squeeze more Duresses or other hand milling you think is better. Then on your fourth or third turn bust out a dark ritual and mill their hand with a Duress and use the extra to bring out Nemesis. Even if they have counters use Raise Dead x4 some cards that bring back creatures or other spells are too expensive so I suggest low cost spells like Raise Dead or use Countersquall and Counterspell. On an added note do what I did and add x4 Nemesis x4 Duress x4 Raise Dead x1 Damnation x4 Counterspell x4 Coun... (see all)

posts.post_content: To the guy asking if attacking with two of them mills 20 or 40: it mills 20. When a card mentions it's own name in the text, it refers only to itself, not to other copies.
posts.html:
To the guy asking if attacking with two of them mills 20 or 40: it mills 20. When a card mentions it's own name in the text, it refers only to itself, not to other copies.

posts.post_content: So here's a question: If you had two Nemesis of Reason cards in play and you attacked with both of them, would the defending player have to discard 40 cards instead of 20 because the text on each card refers to the name "Nemesis of Reason" instead of say something like, "When this creature attacks..."?
